lines.text: Gomez, I'm leaving this house and I'm taking the children with me!
Take the children! Take the neighbor's children! Take Mama!
Fine, we'll share custody. But I get Lurch.
[Discussing how Gomez and Morticia have such a happy relationship]
How do you and Morticia do it?
Never go to bed angry... or on fire.
Oh, Gomez, I love it when you take an irrational stance against overwhelming odds with no hope of success.
Tish, that's... Spanish. Oh, well just as good.
